titles.title: Recognizing and thanking the Nation's women's colleges and universities and recognizing March 5 as "National Women's Colleges and Universities Day".
Recognizing and thanking the Nation's women's colleges and universities and recognizing March 5 as "National Women's Colleges and Universities Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes and thanks the womenâ€™s college movement and sector for their invaluable contribution to higher education and the workforce in the United States.
